title: Attendance
content: So was really sick the past week and missed the first week of clg..if I attend continuously after this will I be able to make up for the attendance ðŸ˜­ scared fr

comments.body: You should be able to cover up a week's absence easily and still have a couple of days to spare. If you have any medical certificate, that will help you out too.
They aren't accepting medical certificates anymore lmao. Atleast that's what my teachers told , the new cut off is 75% and below which no medical certificate can save you
Okay thank you! And like they said they ainâ€™t accepting medical certificates anymore so would I still be able to cover?
Yes you should be able to
Maybe its like that for S&H dept..
